attributes.action: Force subway to bring back the oat and raisin cookies 🍪
attributes.background: Force a bill to do the above

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or House of Commons is responsible for.

Decisions about what products to sell in Subway venues are a matter for Subway, not the Government or House of Commons.

As a result it is not possible for the Government or House of Commons to take the action you have requested.
